also_known_as: Asano Ruri / 浅野 るり
Misaki Yuuka / 岬 ゆうか
Misaki Yuuka / 美咲 ゆうか
Sakagami Yuki / 坂上 由希
Takaguchi Madoka / 高口 まどか
Takahashi Yukino / 高橋 雪乃
biography:
Ruri Asano is a Japanese voice actress, previously affiliated with Mausu Promotion until April 2010.

Takaguchi Madoka is an alias used by Asano Ruri.

Misaki Yuuka is an alias of Asano Ruri for adult works.
name: Ruri Asano
